summary.span: 为远程调用实现使用 TCP 协议传输消息的客户端信道。

span.span: For remote calls, implements a client channel that uses the TCP protocol to transmit messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE [untrusted-data-class-note](~/includes/untrusted-data-class-note.md)] 通道传输跨远程处理边界的消息 (例如，计算机或应用程序域) 。Channels transport messages across remoting boundaries (for example, computers or application domains). 类使用 TCP 协议传输消息。The class transports messages using the TCP protocol. 通道由 .NET Framework 远程处理基础结构用于传输远程调用。Channels are used by the .NET Framework remoting infrastructure to transport remote calls. 当客户端调用远程对象时，调用将被序列化为客户端通道发送并由服务器通道接收的消息。When a client makes a call to a remote object, the call is serialized into a message that is sent by a client channel and received by a server channel. 然后对其进行反序列化和处理。It is then deserialized and processed. 任何返回值由服务器通道传输并由客户端通道接收。Any returned values are transmitted by the server channel and received by the client channel. 若要在客户端执行额外的消息处理，可以指定接口的实现，通过 该接口，通过该接口传递的所有消息 。To perform additional processing of messages on the client side, you can specify an implementation of the interface through which all messages processed by the are passed. 默认情况下， 类使用二进制格式化程序对所有消息进行序列化。By default, the class uses a binary formatter to serialize all messages. 对象具有关联的配置属性，这些属性可在运行时在配置文件中设置 (方法是：调用静态 方法) 或通过将集合传递 到 构造函数) 以编程方式 (。A object has associated configuration properties that can be set at run time either in a configuration file (by invoking the static method) or programmatically (by passing a collection to the constructor). 有关这些配置属性的列表，请参阅的文档 。For a list of these configuration properties, see the documentation for . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示 如何使用类来调用远程类型。The following code example shows the use of the class to call a remote type. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/client.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/client.cs#20)] 上面示例中调用的远程类型由以下代码定义。The remote type called in the example above is defined by the following code. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/remotable.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/remotable.cs#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关通道配置属性的详细信息，请参阅 [通道和格式化程序配置属性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100))。For more information about channel configuration properties, see [Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/kw7c6kwc(v=vs.100)). 如果不需要接收器功能，请将参数设置 `sinkProvider` 为 `null` 。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此构造函数创建 具有特定配置属性的对象。The following code example shows the use of this constructor to create a object with specific configuration properties. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpAuth#31](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpAuth/CPP/client.cpp#31)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpAuth#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpAuth/CS/client.cs#31)]

exception.span: 配置属性的格式设置不正确。

span.span: A configuration property was incorrectly formatted.

related.span: 通道和格式化程序配置属性

span.span: Channel and Formatter Configuration Properties

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数 使用参数设置属性 `name` 。This constructor sets the property by using the `name` parameter. 如果要注册多个通道，则每个通道都必须具有唯一的名称。If you want to register more than one channel, each channel must have a unique name. 如果不需要接收器功能，请将参数设置 `sinkProvider` 为 `null` 。If you do not require sink functionality, set the `sinkProvider` parameter to `null`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何构造 。The following code example shows how to construct a . [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel#31](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel/CPP/client.cpp#31)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel#31](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel/CS/client.cs#31)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个已注册的通道都具有唯一的名称。Every registered channel has a unique name. 此名称用于在调用时检索特定通道 。The name is used to retrieve a specific channel when calling . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example shows the use of this property. summary.span: 获取当前信道的优先级。

span.span: Gets the priority of the current channel.

value.span: 一个整数，表示分配给该信道的优先级。

span.span: An integer that represents the priority assigned to the channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 优先级控制竞争的客户端连接到给定终结点的顺序;优先级较高的通道在较低优先级通道之前连接。The priority controls the order in which competing clients connect to a given endpoint; higher priority channels connect before lower priority channels. 默认优先级为 1;允许负的优先级。The default priority is 1; negative priorities are allowed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此属性。The following code example shows the use of this property. [!code-cpp[Remoting_TcpInfo#22](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CPP/client.cpp#22)] [!code-csharp[Remoting_TcpInfo#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Remoting_TcpInfo/CS/client.cs#22)]

Can be .

param.name: remoteChannelData
param.span: 新接收器将把消息传送到的远程主机的信道数据对象。

Can be .

param.name: objectURI
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含新信道消息接收器的 URI，该信道消息接收器将消息传送到指定 URL 或信道数据对象。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a URI of the new channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

param.span: 此参数未经初始化即被传递。

span.span: This parameter is passed uninitialized.

summary.span: 返回将消息传送到指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。

span.span: Returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

returns.span: 将消息传递给指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。

span.span: A channel message sink that delivers messages to the specified URL or channel data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回将消息传递到指定 URL 或信道数据对象的信道消息接收器。The method returns a channel message sink that delivers messages to either the specified URL or the channel data object. 如果 `uri` 参数为 `null` ， `remoteChannelData` 则将用作接收器的目标。If the `uri` parameter is `null`, `remoteChannelData` is used as a target for the sink. `url`或 `remoteChannelData` 参数可以为 `null` ，但不能同时为两者。Either the `url` or `remoteChannelData` parameters can be `null`, but not both. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example shows the use this method. [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel/CPP/client.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.Tcp.TcpClientChannel/CS/client.cs#32)]
